title: Adults-Only Eco-Glamping Luxury in Victoria's High Country with Tent Upgrade & Daily Breakfast Hamper
description: Embrace the tranquility of Victoria's High Country with an adults-only stay in a luxe eco tent at Mansfield Glamping. Experience the beauty of the outdoors without forgoing life's little luxuries, staying in a sophisticated bell tent offering plush bedding, a cosy wood fire and breathtaking mountain views - all just 2.5 hours from Melbourne. High-end onsite facilities add to the comfort of your stay and include shared country-style bathrooms with refreshing showers. The beautifully crafted outdoor kitchen lends itself to nights dining under the stars at the banquet-style table, with a BBQ cooking station, kitchen sinks, a fridge and all utensils. Lie back on a day bed or cosy up around the fire pit with someone special.
offer_address: 299 Rifle Butts Road, Mansfield, Victoria 3722, Australia

title: Adults-Only Eco-Glamping Luxury in Victoria's High Country with Daily Breakfast Hamper
description:
Embrace the tranquility of Victoria's High Country with an adults-only glamping experience on a historic rural farming property. Experience the beauty of the outdoors without forgoing life's little luxuries, staying in a sophisticated bell tent offering plush bedding, a cosy wood fire and breathtaking mountain views - all just 2.5 hours from Melbourne.

High-end onsite facilities add to the comfort of your stay, including shared country-style bathrooms with refreshing showers. The beautifully crafted outdoor kitchen lends itself to nights dining under the stars at the banquet-style table, with BBQ cooking station, kitchen sinks, a fridge and all utensils. Lie back on a day bed or cosy up by the fire pit with someone special, then retire to the luxury of your queen bed. Wake up to rolling fog and kookaburras laughing to do it all over again!
offer_address: 299 Rifle Butts Road, Mansfield, Victoria 3722, Australia

Experience the beauty of the outdoors without forgoing life's little luxuries, staying in a sophisticated bell tent offering plush bedding, a cosy wood fire and breathtaking mountain views - all just 2.5 hours from Melbourne. High-end onsite facilities add to the comfort of your stay and include shared country-style bathrooms with refreshing showers. Designed as a welcome retreat from reality for those who love the great outdoors, Mansfield Glamping promises personal touches that make this 'glampsite' extra special. Whether you visit the High Country to hit the slopes in winter or for scenic walks in the warmer months, Mansfield Glamping adds a touch of rustic eco-luxury to your stay.
offer_address: 299 Rifle Butts Road, Mansfield, Victoria 3722, Australia

title: Adults-Only Eco Glamping in Victoria's High Country with Daily Breakfast
description:
Embrace the tranquility of Victoria's High Country with an adults-only stay in a luxe eco tent at Mansfield Glamping. Experience the beauty of the outdoors without forgoing life's little luxuries, staying in sophisticated bell tents offering plush bedding, cosy wood fires and breathtaking mountain views - all just 2.5 hours from Melbourne.

High-end onsite facilities add to the comfort of your stay and include shared country-style bathrooms with refreshing showers. The beautifully crafted outdoor kitchen lends itself to nights dining under the stars at the banquet-style table, with a BBQ cooking station, kitchen sinks, a fridge and all utensils. Lie back on a bean bag in the 'Chill Zone' or cosy up with someone special around the fire pit. 

Whether you visit the High Country to hit the slopes in winter or for scenic walks in the warmer months, Mansfield Glamping adds a touch of rustic eco-luxe to your stay.

**Your handpicked inclusions**:

- Wake up to a daily continental breakfast of fresh pastries, fruit, coffee, tea and more
- Enjoy a complimentary bottle of sparkling wine in your luxe eco tent
- Sweeten your stay with local chocolates on arrival and a freshly baked muffin each
- Relax with 1.30pm early check-in and 11.30an late checkout (subject to availability on Fridays and Saturdays)

**Hot Tub Upgrade**: Soak in your private woodfired hot tub before cosy evenings in your beautifully furnished Emperor Tent when you upgrade.

**Exclusive Hire Upgrade**: Celebrating something special? Escape as a group and enjoy exclusive use of all seven onsite Bell Tents plus all Mansfield Glamping facilities (packages valid for up to 14 guests).
offer_address: 299 Rifle Butts Road, Mansfield, Victoria 3722, Australia
